#summary BlitzMax language binding of the Chipmunk Game Dynamics library.

= Introduction =

[http://wiki.slembcke.net/main/published/Chipmunk Chipmunk] is a fast 2D Game Dynamics engine.

To compile this module, you need to use a custom version of BMK. See [http://code.google.com/p/wxmax/wiki/WhatToDoWithBmk WhatToDoWithBmk] for more details.
